Uses of Package
de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.minkowski

  • Packages that use de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.minkowski 
    Package Description
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.outlier.distance
    Distance-based outlier detection algorithms, such as DBOutlier and kNN.
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.minkowski
    Minkowski space Lp norms such as the popular Euclidean and Manhattan distances.
    de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.spatial.rstarvariants.query
    Queries on the R-Tree family of indexes: kNN and range queries
  • Classes in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.minkowski used by de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.outlier.distance 
    Class and Description
    LPNormDistanceFunction
    Lp-Norm (Minkowski norms) are a family of distances for NumberVectors.

    Class and Description
    EuclideanDistanceFunction
    Euclidean distance for NumberVectors.
    LPIntegerNormDistanceFunction
    Lp-Norm for NumberVectors, optimized version for integer values of p.
    LPNormDistanceFunction
    Lp-Norm (Minkowski norms) are a family of distances for NumberVectors.
    LPNormDistanceFunction.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    ManhattanDistanceFunction
    Manhattan distance for NumberVectors.
    MaximumDistanceFunction
    Maximum distance for NumberVectors.
    MinimumDistanceFunction
    Minimum distance for NumberVectors.
    SparseEuclideanDistanceFunction
    Euclidean distance function, optimized for SparseNumberVectors.
    SparseLPNormDistanceFunction
    Lp-Norm, optimized for SparseNumberVectors.
    SparseManhattanDistanceFunction
    Manhattan distance, optimized for SparseNumberVectors.
    SparseMaximumDistanceFunction
    Maximum distance, optimized for SparseNumberVectors.
    SparseSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction
    Squared Euclidean distance function, optimized for SparseNumberVectors.
    SquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction
    Squared Euclidean distance, optimized for SparseNumberVectors.
    WeightedEuclideanDistanceFunction
    Weighted Euclidean distance for NumberVectors.
    WeightedLPNormDistanceFunction
    Weighted version of the Minkowski Lp norm distance for NumberVector.
    WeightedManhattanDistanceFunction
    Weighted version of the Manhattan (L1) metric.
    WeightedMaximumDistanceFunction
    Weighted version of the maximum distance function for NumberVectors.
    WeightedSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction
    Weighted squared Euclidean distance for NumberVectors.
